Translations.Text: Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo mengshi
yi zhege anning de chengshi mengshi
wo que yi ba ren zaocheng juyou zuimei de xingtai
ranhou wo shi ta bian cheng zui beilie de
dan xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
Cihou, ni zenmo hai fouren baoying ne?
Nandao zhenzhu bushi zui gongzheng de panjue zhe ma?
